statements: SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates ORDER BY software_name;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE status = 'available';
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT software_name, patch_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE software_name = 'Microsoft Office' AND status = 'Successfully Installed' ORDER BY patch_date DESC
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM software_updates WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT software_name, version, status FROM software_updates WHERE version LIKE '10.%' ORDER BY software_name ASC
SELECT software_name, DATE_FORMAT(patch_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_patch_date FROM software_updates
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates ORDER BY version DESC;
SELECT patch_description, patch_date FROM patch_management WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT update_id, software_name, version, release_date FROM software_updates WHERE software_name LIKE 'Microsoft%';
SELECT DISTINCT software_name FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_name, version FROM software_updates WHERE update_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE software_name LIKE 'Microsoft%';
SELECT update_id, software_name, version, release_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, patch_description FROM software_updates JOIN patch_management ON software_updates.update_id = patch_management.update_id;
SELECT software_name, version, patch_description FROM software_updates JOIN patch_management ON software_updates.update_id = patch_management.update_id WHERE patch_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_name, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE vulnerabilities_found = TRUE;
SELECT software_name, update_description FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, update_date, vulnerabilities_found FROM software_updates WHERE vulnerabilities_found = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM patch_management WHERE deployed_successfully = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT update_id, software_name, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE vulnerabilities_found = true;
SELECT software_name, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM software_updates GROUP BY software_name ORDER BY total_updates DESC;
SELECT software_name, MAX(update_date) AS last_update_date FROM software_updates GROUP BY software_name;
SELECT s.software_name, p.patch_version, p.deployment_date FROM software_updates s INNER JOIN patch_management p ON s.software_name = p.software_name ORDER BY p.deployment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_name, version_number FROM software_updates ORDER BY version_number DESC;
SELECT software_name, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE software_name = 'AppX';
SELECT update_description FROM software_updates WHERE update_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patch_management WHERE patch_status = 'Applied' ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE version_number = '1.0';
SELECT software_name, version_number FROM software_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patch_name, patch_date FROM patch_management WHERE patch_status = 'pending' ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT software_name, version_number, update_description FROM software_updates WHERE software_name LIKE '%security%' OR software_name LIKE '%patch%';
SELECT u.software_name, p.patch_name, uh.user_id FROM software_updates u INNER JOIN update_history uh ON u.update_id = uh.update_id INNER JOIN patch_management p ON uh.update_id = p.patch_id;
SELECT software_name, version, update_date FROM software_updates;
SELECT * FROM patch_management WHERE patch_status = 'Applied';
SELECT software_name, patch_version FROM patch_management WHERE patch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT software_name, version, update_notes FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT activity_type, user_id, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT software_name, version, update_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patch_id, patch_version, patch_status FROM patch_management WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 12345 AND activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT software_name, version, update_notes FROM software_updates WHERE software_name LIKE 'App%' AND version IN ('1.0', '2.0', '3.0') ORDER BY software_name, version;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') AND activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id, activity_date DESC LIMIT 10;
